title: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725 - Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When I answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog and then double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it, the contents of the window are replaced with the original almost instantly. However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1) Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog. 2) Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 3) Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor. Observe that it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
